riddle1.question: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I?

riddle2.question: I have keys but no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter, but you can't go outside. What am I?

riddle3.question: I have cities but no houses, forests but no trees, and rivers but no water. What am I?

riddle4.question: I have hands but can't clap. I have a face but no mouth. What am I?

riddle5.question: I have a head and a tail but no body. What am I?

riddle6.question: I go up and up but never come down. What am I?
